alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 25 at 10:05PM PDT until March 26 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Western San Fernando Valley and Santa Susana Mountains. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Susana Mountains; Western San Fernando Valley
